metadata.title: CVE-2019-14275 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - negligible.
metadata.description:
Xfig fig2dev 3.2.7a has a stack-based buffer overflow in the calc_arrow function in bound.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.7a-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.7a-7').
